General.Name: Volcanic Gold Mines Inc
General.Description: Volcanic Gold Mines Inc. engages in the acquisition and exploration of resource properties. The company explores for gold and silver deposits. It holds an option to earn a 60% interest in Holly and Banderas gold-silver properties located in Guatemala. The company was formerly known as Volcanic Metals Corp. and changed its name to Volcanic Gold Mines Inc. in January 2017. Volcanic Gold Mines Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 200 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3L6

5.Name: Mr. James Martin Dawson P.Geo., M.Sc., P.Eng.
